title: Software Developer
name: Name :
aboutMe: My name is Mathieu Alain - Mathieu is my first name by the way. I'm and I live near a beautiful city named Angers, France. I'm currently studying to obtain a Master's degree as an International project manager in IT and Networks at ESAIP. I'm also working in an IT company named Orkeis where I work on a few projects in ASP.NET and PHP. I like to spend my free time playing video games, enjoying a football game or a beer with my friends. If you want to get more information about me feel free to visit my LinkedIn or you can get my resume by clicking here.
projectsIntro: Here, you can find some open source projects I worked on. I can't showcase most of the projects I worked on because they are proprietary to the company where I was working at the time. I'm hoping to work on more open-source projects during my free time. You can find their source code on my github.
saintHubertBody: Saint-Hubert is a web application based on PHP - Laravel to manage a hunting club. This app was created to answer the needs of a specific French hunting club and is only available in French for now.
websiteBody: This is my personal web site. The one you are visiting right now. It was made using Bootstrap and some custom CSS.
dbSaverBody: DB Saver is a small Python script that I developed to backup easily and simply my databases.
contactIntro: Feel free to contact me for any personal or business inquiries by email at alain.mathieu1996@gmail.com or by filling this form.
